thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Elliott Provides Statement Concerning Investigation By The Seoul Southern District Prosecutor’s Office

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Elliott Provides Statement Concerning Investigation By The Seoul Southern District Prosecutor’s Office
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Elliott :
* ELLIOTT PROVIDES STATEMENT ON PRESS ARTICLES CONCERNING INVESTIGATION BY THE SEOUL SOUTHERN DISTRICT PROSECUTOR’S OFFICE
* ELLIOTT SAYS USED SWAPS LAWFULLY AND IN A MANNER CONSISTENT WITH KOREAN LAW
* ELLIOTT SAYS IT ALSO NOTES THAT THE INVESTIGATION HAS BEEN PENDING SINCE 2015
* ELLIOTT SAYS HAS COOPERATED WITH THE PPO AND PROVIDED DETAILED INFORMATION TO ASSIST THE PPO IN UNDERSTANDING THE MATTER
* ELLIOTT SAYS REPUBLIC OF KOREA FINANCIAL SUPERVISORY SERVICE, AFTER EXAMINING THE MATTER, CHOSE NOT TO FILE ANY ENFORCEMENT ACTION ITSELF Further company coverage:
